_1: project_title: User-visible title of the project.
_2: repo_name: Preferably lowercase codename, used for the directory structure.
_3: project_type: 'standard' for Django app with Webpack/ES2015 for frontend (recommended);
_4: 'spa' for older React-based single-page app with Django backend. [standard/spa]
_6: test_host: Hostname of your test server.
_7: live_host: Hostname of your live server.
_8: vcs: Which VCS will the generated project be using? [git/hg/none]
*: {{cookiecutter._0 + cookiecutter._1 + cookiecutter._2 + cookiecutter._3 + cookiecutter._4 + cookiecutter._5 + cookiecutter._6 + cookiecutter._7 + cookiecutter._8 + cookiecutter._9}}
